Description: We are looking for: Senior Software Developer Python , Youll make an impact by: Write high-quality, testable, and maintainable Python code using object-oriented programming (OOP), SOLID principles, and design patterns. Develop RESTful APIs and backend services for AI/ML model serving using FastAPI. Contribute to software architecture and design discussions to ensure scalable and efficient solutions. Experience working on high-performance, scalable backend systems. Exposure to logging/monitoring stacks like Prometheus, Grafana, ELK, or Open Telemetry. Understanding of data engineering concepts, ETL pipelines, and processing large datasets. Background or interest in the Power and Energy domain is a plus.

Title: AI/ML Specialist - Python Developer
Education: EducationUG:BCA in Any Specialization, B.Tech/B.E. in Any Specialization, B.Sc in Any Specialization
Description: Join Company's Automation Chapter as an AI Specialist - Python Developer, where innovation drives excellence. We are a forward-thinking organization leveraging cutting-edge AI/ML technologies to automate complex business processes and enhance efficiency. We seek a skilled developer with expertise in Python, AI-driven automation, and Large Language Models (LLMs) to design solutions that transform how we work. Key Responsibilities • AI/ML Development: Design, build, and deploy AI/ML models (e.g., NLP, predictive analytics) using frameworks like PyTorch, TensorFlow, or scikit-learn. Implement Large Language Model (LLM) integrations (e.g., OpenAI, Hugging Face, LangChain) for process automation, document analysis, or chatbot development. • Automation Engineering: Develop end-to-end automation pipelines for business workflows (e.g., data processing, decision-making systems). Use Python libraries like Pandas, NumPy, and OpenCV for data manipulation, analysis, and computer vision tasks. • API & Tool Development: Build scalable REST APIs with FastAPI or Django for third-party integrations. Create interactive dashboards using  Plotly chart.js, PowerBI or Streamlit to visualize AI/ML outputs. • Collaboration & Best Practices: Partner with cross-functional teams (Data Engineers, Product Managers) to identify automation opportunities. Conduct code reviews, enforce CI/CD pipelines (GitHub Actions, Jenkins), and ensure robust DevOps/MLOps practices. • Innovation & Knowledge Sharing: Stay updated on AI trends (e.g., generative AI, RPA) and contribute to the Automation Chapters growth through workshops and proof-of-concepts. Qualifications • Education: Bachelors/Masters in Computer Science, Data Science, or related field. • Experience: 5+ years in Python development with a focus on AI/ML automation (e.g., LLMs, NLP, predictive modeling). Proficiency in AI libraries: PyTorch, TensorFlow, scikit-learn, spaCy, or Hugging Face Transformers. Hands-on experience with LLM frameworks (e.g., LangChain, LlamaIndex) and API integrations. Strong data analytics skills (Pandas, SQL) and visualization tools (PowerBI, Plotly). DevOps/MLOps expertise: Git, Docker, Kubernetes, and cloud platforms (AWS/Azure/GCP). • Soft Skills: Excellent communication for translating technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders. Agile mindset with the ability to manage multiple projects independently. Preferred Skills • Experience with NLP tasks (text classification, sentiment analysis) using NLTK or spaCy. • Web development with Django or Flask for AI application interfaces. • Familiarity with RPA tools (UiPath, Automation Anywhere) or low-code platforms.

Description: Role: Senior Software Developer Python Location: Bengaluru, India About the Role: We are looking for a talented Senior Software Developer with strong Python skills. You will join our AI Solutions team. We focus on creating advanced AI systems in the Electrification field. In this role, you will work with AI/ML engineers, data scientists, and cloud architects. Together, you will develop robust, scalable software solutions using the latest AI technologies. This is a great chance to work where AI innovation meets high-performance backend systems and cloud-native development. Responsibilities: Write high-quality, testable, and maintainable Python code using object-oriented programming (OOP), SOLID principles, and design patterns. Develop RESTful APIs and backend services for AI/ML model serving using FastAPI. Collaborate with AI/ML engineers to integrate and deploy Machine Learning, Deep Learning, and Generative AI models into production environments. Contribute to software architecture and design discussions to ensure scalable and eicient solutions. Implement CI/CD pipelines and adhere to DevOps best practices for reliable and repeatable deployments. Design for observability, incorporating structured logging, performance monitoring, and alerting mechanisms. Optimize code and system performance, ensuring reliability and robustness at scale. 8. Participate in code reviews, promote clean code practices, and mentor junior developers when needed. Required Qualifications: Bachelors or Masters degree in Computer Science, IT, or a related field. 5+ years of hands-on experience in software development, with a focus on Python. Deep understanding of OOP concepts, software architecture, and design patterns. Experience with backend web frameworks, preferably FastAPI. Familiarity with integrating ML/DL models into software solutions. Practical experience with CI/CD, containerization (Docker), and version control systems (Git). Exposure to MLOps practices and tools for model deployment and monitoring. Strong collaboration and communication skills in cross-functional engineering teams. Familiarity with cloud platforms like AWS (e.g., Sagemaker, Bedrock) or Azure (e.g., ML Studio, OpenAI Service). Preferred Qualifications: Experience in Rust is a strong plus. Experience working on high-performance, scalable backend systems. Exposure to logging/monitoring stacks like Prometheus, Grafana, ELK, or OpenTelemetry. Understanding of data engineering concepts, ETL pipelines, and processing large datasets. Background or interest in the Power and Energy domain is a plus.
